content: 1HoDLCLUB 5oz GENESIS Fine Silver 999.9 Ingots Sale !Welcome everyone to the Official 5oz GENESIS ingots sale !I hope you all are fine ! First i want to thank you all for your always trust and support since the beginning ! really appreciate !Here are sold serials above #10! the low serials will be auctioned off in another thread!as explained in the last auction, only 50 ingots were mint ! It's a 5oz fine silver 999.9 ingot! 95x75mm! on the face of this one you can see the legendary front page of The Times newspaper of January 3, 2009 with some modification to be adapted to the molding !At the back you can find the large version 1HoDLCLUB certification pad! the square next to this one at each laser-engraved BTC public address, each public key start with "1GENESiS.." ! in the center you can find the first made 1HoDLCLUB hologram(can be called the Genesis hologram  ) with it's window, and on the window you can see the number of the ingots and below the private key! !Each ingot is loaded with 0.021 BTC as shown on the rear of the ingot. Serial Numbers can be choose, first arrived, first served.5oz GENESIS Ingots Fine Silver 999.9Mintage : 50 - [26 auctionned, 14 SOLD / 9 AVAILABLEMaterial : 999.9 Fine SilverSize : 95x75mmThickness : 2.30mmWeight : 5ozDenomination : 0.021BTC Serial in sale : 11-SOLD  12-SOLD   13-SOLD   14-SOLD   15-SOLD   16-SOLD   17-SOLD   18-SOLD   19-SOLD   22-SOLD   26-   27-   32-   33-SOLD   37-SOLD   39-SOLD   41-   42-   43-   44-   45-   46-   50-SOLD   Serial : 1 to 50Price :  per ingots + 0.021 BTC loading per ingot BTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngShipping cost [Express + Tracking] :FREE SHIPPINGAll paid orders will be dispatched between 48/72HAfter payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Chips / Loading / ShippingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address11 1GENESiSWatrWv2A5mTKqEZqpD5z4rVesU12 1GENESiSiy3VyG3X7ncsA18M2VnbXZKvU513 1GENESiSL4oEaJqdfuyqzMbHp4QTXAW3V514 1GENESiSPKt8cMtFRMQ2mvGSx7GzQwSaL915 1GENESiSHno5MVyK9LCw1ZpKunKSbFXsKN16 1GENESiSTT12EgzAvprrUrkuPf1huw7ZeQ17 1GENESiS5bjtJcDkRXBnz8R53a3FQwefHP18 1GENESiS9gz9Xa1kFBrjkYYVqwzczX7Yrs19 1GENESiS5CZCtxSfdXWaSqiC1iC4hGosna22 1GENESiSvL2XpaRGbvAWgEPd45Rsf2pjqm26 1GENESiSH45axN5T4C4Q7WPC1rpJJKfwCY27 1GENESiSNJ1jx5JmUgNh4grgVQ8UzcicaH32 1GENESiSaMvegTo41SXiUtbeUUvrVG9KEp33 1GENESiSn6hbUpL5K7BJbVxaAh8suM1tFe37 1GENESiSeWDcTyhc6ubSvtTkwxDpurZqVX39 1GENESiSKbahw6jFYGFgSnJGScxRAmaRco41 1GENESiS746xcPfgDMpzqTmgVNyL1nJRM342 1GENESiS2fait3g89mGkAuSQDMSEku3y7G43 1GENESiSKEXCGT2iGtbe1Hxx8bF8QMBmRH44 1GENESiSUoG1FFh2EJ1gLYJXbuucMKxyPX45 1GENESiShqg1bJB4264XCEtECeghXpB1df46 1GENESiSJ7LUokp5krMFSdjJ87UTFxY5ca50 1GENESiSuA1rEk6fzXi2Kk7Swh6YBd7bsa1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store OPEN!Twitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: This is a very cool product. Nicely thought out. My question is if these are shipped in any sort of plastic airtite capsule or if you know where a proper fitting airtite could be purchased for these ingots? I am considering purchasing one but would like to make sure it maintains it’s shine.

comments.author: MrCryptHodl
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on August 23, 2022, 06:23:31 AMThis is a very cool product. Nicely thought out. My question is if these are shipped in any sort of plastic airtite capsule or if you know where a proper fitting airtite could be purchased for these ingots? I am considering purchasing one but would like to make sure it maintains it’s shine. Hi buddy ! hope you're fine !  Thanks for your words! very appreciated that the product and the concept is loved!So yes they come with a box as you can see in the photo below, I could not call it airtite, but having a certain number in conservation for 2 months now, I can assure that there is no degradation preserved in its boxes.Thanks for the interest! While waiting for your answer, I wish you a wonderful day!
